reg_info.act_under: Shortline Railways Act, 1995   Loi de 1995 sur les chemins de fer d’intérêt local

content.content: 1. The following corporations are designated for the purpose of subsection 2 (2) of the Act: 1. Port Stanley Terminal Rail Incorporated. 2. Goderich-Exeter Railway Company Limited. 3. South Simcoe Railway Heritage Corporation.  O. Reg. 300/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following corporations are designated for the purpose of subsection 2 (2) of the Act:

1. Port Stanley Terminal Rail Incorporated.

2. Goderich-Exeter Railway Company Limited.

3. South Simcoe Railway Heritage Corporation.  O. Reg. 300/96, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 300/96, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 300/96, s. 2.
